March 2016 to January 2018

Key Projects - Aurora BI (SAP), ES Analytics, BI as a Service, Service Center BI, Premier services
(PSR)

I am accountable for implementing a unified analytical platform for the entire Enterprise Services
business (~$6 billion) in Microsoft. This allows the services business to strategize and take key
operational decisions during the monthly and quarterly business reviews with the Leadership
Team.

Key Responsibilities
• Product Owner - Manage & prioritize product backlog. Evangelize product feature with other
teams and enable more product adoption.
• Product Roadmap - Prepare roadmap for the product for the upcoming fiscal year.
• Sprint Planning & monitoring - Scoping, resource levelling / smoothing
• Stakeholder management - Manage key business stakeholders, get / set expectations and
manage communication.
• Risk management & mitigation
• Co-ordinate cross functional teams for product releases
• Product Retirement - Plan and manage existing product retirement, interact, communicate with
all downstream systems to ensure product retirement and replacement is smooth.
• Product migration - Retire Informatica and migrate to Azure Data Factory for ETL process.
• Compliance Management
◦ Global Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) - Analyze, estimation and planning for the BI group.

Key Skills - Microsoft Azure SQL DW, Azure Data Factory, SQL Server 2016, Power BI dashboard,
Rest API

McKesson, Singapore Provident Fund, SSE Home Services

Key Responsibilities
• Delivery Management - Provide technical leadership and strategic direction to the testing
organization and project delivery team.
• Presales - Closely interact with customer & pre-sales team, response to RFP, Test estimates and
prepare Statement of Work. Won multiple test only engagements from CEE, LATAM, India region
• Test Strategy & Test Plan development & review for test only engagements.
• Test Consulting Services - Worked with the UK based customer "SSE Home Services" to provide
test consultancy and technical guidance to the offshore TCS Kolkata team.
• Test Processes - Defined process steps and quality gates for test only engagements at
organization level.
• Quality Analysis - Analysis of trends in testing, identify best practices, improvement areas. I
have prepared checklist for presales & delivery team that reduced the effort and cost of review
and lead to faster turnover to the customer.
• Project Recovery Team - I am one the key members in the project recovery team. I work closely
with the project team and leadership to ensure that the project is recovered successfully. I have
successfully recovered 3 critical project with high quality. In the current recovery project, I have
managed a team size of 103 team members.
• Project Delivery review- As a part of Technical Quality Assurance (TQA), I am the quality
gatekeeper for all dashboard projects (~30 projects) within Microsoft Global Delivery. All test
artifacts, test approach, test processes are reviewed and signed off during TQA review.
